content: felted sauna hat materials & measurements yarn feltro by lana grossa approx 170g gauge unfelted 10 stitches = 10 cm in stockinette stitch needles 8mm circular needle 60 cm and 8mm double-pointed needles dpns size medium unfelted circumference approx 80 cm to fit hat size 57cm construction cast on using dpns cast on 7 stitches crown increases increase 7 stitches evenly every other round continue in this way until you have a total of 84 stitches body switch to circular needle when possible knit every round stockinette in the round until the piece measures 36 cm from the top bind off use the icelandic bind-off for a stretchy edge felting instructions machine wash felt the hat by washing it at 60°c use a regular cycle with a little detergent and a couple of towels to aid the felting process shaping while still damp stretch and shape the hat over a round household object e g a bowl balloon or ball to block it into shape let dry completely ©françoise pescatore
